ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah is my Lord and your Lord so worship Him. This is a straight path.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily God is my Lord and your Lord; so worship Him. This is the straight path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah is my Lord and your Lord; therefore, serve Him. That is the Straight Way.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is your Lord and my Lord, so worship Him. This is the right path".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Allah is indeed my Lord, and yours – therefore worship Him; this is the Straight Path.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, Allah! He is my Lord and your Lord. So worship Him. This is the straight path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely Allah is my Lord and your Lord, therefore serve Him; this is the right path:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Assuredly God is my Lord and your Lord; therefore serve Him; this is a straight path.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Allah, He is my Lord and your Lord. So worship Him. This is a right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: For God, He is my Lord and your Lord: so worship Him: that is a straight path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Allah! He is my lord and your Lord, so worship Him: this is the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed Allah is my Lord and your Lord; so worship Him. This is a straight path.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For Allah, He is my Lord and your Lord: so worship ye Him: this is a Straight Way."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, Allah! He is my Lord (God) and your Lord (God). So worship Him (Alone). This is the (only) Straight Path (i.e. Allah's religion of true Islamic Monotheism)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, therefore worship Him. That is the Straight Path'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him—this is a straight path.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:64] Assuredly God is my Lord and your Lord; so worship Him — that is a straight path’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Allah, He is my Lord) my Creator (and your Lord) and your Creator. (So worship Him) believe in His divine Oneness. (This is a right path) this is an established religion with which He is pleased.
